snippet.title: CavEX v0.3.0 release - gameplay
snippet.description:
All video footage recorded on a real Wii. There are a lot more changes that this video doesn't show.
To play, extract contents of the zip to the root of your Wii's SDcard.
Download: https://aos.party/download_public/cavex_a003.zip
Needs Homebrew Channel to work.

WARNING: Do not exit the game too fast, or it might corrupt your world save. After returning back to the world selection screen give it a few seconds to save any changes to disk. Then it should be safe to exit to the homebrew channel.

This is very likely the last major update for now. I've spent far too many days on something I no longer enjoy working on. In the beginning this was just to show that it could be done, that the Wii is truly capable of it, and prove them wrong. I even considered never releasing it, and just leaving it buried on my hard drive, like those many little toy projects I've made over the years. However I thought it was too amazing for no one else to ever experience it.

I hope you have fun playing this release.

Music is C418 Sweden
